sentence: Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig believes rooting out woke prosecutors? and woke judges? is critical to overcoming nationwide crime waves, providing his view on the matter in an interview on SiriusXM's Breitbart News Saturday.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Exclusive  Chief James Craig Rips Woke Prosecutors': Bad Guys Know There's No Consequences' for Crime

sentence: Former Rep. Thaddeus McCotter, remarking on the petition-forging case that caused James Craig, Perry Johnson and other Republicans to get thrown off the gubernatorial ballot a decision they are appealing.
title: The June primaries already ballooning with big money
